tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE CallDetailRecords (
  call_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  caller_id UUID,
  receiver_id UUID,
  call_duration INT,
  call_date DATE,
  billing_amount DECIMAL,
  is_billed BOOLEAN,
  call_type ENUM('incoming', 'outgoing'),
  call_status ENUM('completed', 'missed', 'cancelled'),
  created_at TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE call_detail_records (
  call_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  caller_phone_number VARCHAR,
  receiver_phone_number VARCHAR,
  call_duration INT,
  call_timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE audit_logs (
  log_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  call_id UUID,
  event_type VARCHAR,
  event_description VARCHAR,
  event_timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE call_details (
    call_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    caller_id INT NOT NULL,
    callee_id INT NOT NULL,
    call_duration INT,
    call_start TIMESTAMP,
    call_end TIMESTAMP,
    call_cost DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE audit_logs (
    log_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    action_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    action_date TIMESTAMP,
    user_id INT,
    description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE billing_calls (
    call_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    caller_number VARCHAR,
    callee_number VARCHAR,
    call_duration INT,
    call_cost DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE calls (
    call_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    caller_id INT,
    receiver_id INT,
    call_duration INT,
    call_date TIMESTAMP
);
